game.name: BZZZT
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Become a tiny ZX8000 robot and begin your journey through a beautiful, pixel-art world inspired by games iconic to the platformer genre. Follow a cute story, upgrade your skills, beat challenging levels, and compete with other players for the fastest speedrun!
